translations: 侵蚀；磨损（erode 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Eroding religious belief in Europe may partly explain lowered birthrates.
sentences.translation: 欧洲宗教信仰的削弱可能是出生率下降的其中一个原因。

sentences.sentence: This slippery slope of eroding ethics and bigger risks leads only to disaster.
sentences.translation: 这种道德滑坡以及更大的风险只会导致灾难。

sentences.sentence: We are eroding the very foundations of our economies, livelihoods, food security, health and quality of life worldwide.
sentences.translation: 我们正在侵蚀全球经济、生计、粮食安全、健康和生活质量的根本基础。
